mapper.select: SELECT q.*, d.dict_name question_type_chinese, qn.question_score FROM tab_exam_paper_questions pq INNER JOIN tab_exam_questions q ON pq.question_id = q.id INNER JOIN tab_sys_dict d ON q.question_type = d.dict_code LEFT JOIN tab_exam_questions_number qn ON q.question_type = qn.question_type AND qn.paper_id = pq.paper_id WHERE pq.paper_id = #{paperId}
